Technology director

Fausto De La Torre

Technology Director for Thoughtworks Ecuador and a member of the Global Technology Advisory Board. Co-responsible for the long-term success and growth of ThoughtWorks Ecuador, designing and executing the technology strategy.

I help large organizations to connect business and IT strategies in their digital transformation and innovation journey through IT consulting and custom software delivery.

Large experience mentoring and leading technical leaders and multidisciplinary teams to provide sustainable solutions by building new digital products and modernizing legacy systems.
